<!--<wsdl:definitions xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://www.bglgroup.net/communications/email/v1_0/ws" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:emailp="http://www.bglgroup.net/communications/email/v1_0/payload" xmlns:ns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" targetNamespace="http://www.bglgroup.net/communications/email/v1_0/ws"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://www.bglgroup.net/communications/email/v1_0/ws"> <xs:import namespace="http://www.bglgroup.net/communications/email/v1_0/payload" schemaLocation="email_v1_0_payload.xsd"/> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types>
<wsdl:message name="SendEmailRequest"> <wsdl:part name="SendEmailRequestParameters" element="emailp:SendEmailRequest" /> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SendEmailResponse"> <wsdl:part name="SendEmailResponseParameters" element="emailp:SendEmailResponse" /> </wsdl:message>--> <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://www.dafydd.com/products/ws" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://www.dafydd.com/products/ws" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:prodp="http://www.dafydd.com/products/payload" xmlns:ns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://www.dafydd.com/products/ws"> <xs:import namespace="http://www.dafydd.com/products/payload" schemaLocation="products.xsd"/> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="ProductRequest"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="prodp:ProductRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ProductResponse"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="prodp:ProductResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ProductsRequest"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="prodp:ProductsRequests"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ProductsResponse"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="prodp:ProductsResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="ProductWebService"> <wsdl:documentation> <description label="Description">The product web service contains all of the operations needed retrieving product information</description> </wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:operation name="GetProduct"> <wsdl:documentation> <description label="Description">Return a single product.</description> <cacheable label="Cacheable">No</cacheable> </wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input message="tns:ProductRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:ProductResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="GetProducts"> <wsdl:documentation> <description label="Description">Return a list of products</description> <cacheable label="Cacheable">No</cacheable> </wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input message="tns:ProductsRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:ProductsResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="ProductWebServiceImpl" type="tns:ProductWebService"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="GetProduct"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.dafydd.com/products/ws/GetProduct"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="GetProducts"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.dafydd.com/products/ws/GetProducts"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="ProductWebServiceEndpoint"> <wsdl:port name="ProductWebServicePort" binding="tns:ProductWebServiceImpl"> <soap:address location="http://"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://www.dafydd.com/products/payload" xmlns="http://www.dafydd.com/products/payload" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="ProductRequest" type="ProductRequest"/> <xs:complexType name="ProductRequest"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="ProductId" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="ProductResponse" type="ProductResponse"/> <xs:complexType name="ProductResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Product" type="Product"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="ProductsRequests" type="ProductsRequests"/> <xs:complexType name="ProductsRequests"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Brand" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="ProductsResponse" type="ProductsResponse"/> <xs:complexType name="ProductsResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Products" type="Products"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Products"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Product" type="Product" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Product"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="ProductId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="Brand" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="Specification" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="Price"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"> <xs:totalDigits value="6"/> <xs:fractionDigits value="2"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>
